title: CrackShot枪械插件里设置的枪无效
author: Thuang_dada
txt_content:
自己设置了一把枪,但设置全部在游戏内无效,子弹也打不出来下面是这把枪的代码,求好心人解答
步枪2级:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&a&lType 95&7(&b枪械等级：&a&l2&7)&e&l弹夹容量："
        Item_Type: 274
        Item_Lore: "&c威力：&e&l█&f&l█&c&l血|&c爆头威力：&a&l█&f&l**&c&l血|&e弹夹容量：&a&l**█&6&l发|&b装填速度：&f&l**█&a&l秒|&6射速：&f&l█|&6射程：&a&l**█&e&l█&6&l格"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Dual_Wield: false
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 1
        Recoil_Amount: 
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Speed: 35
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: true
        Projectile_Damage: 6
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions:: true
        Remove_Bullet_Drop: true
        Bullet_Spread: 0.4
        Sounds_Shoot: ITEM_BREAK-1-2-2,NOTE_SNARE_DRUM-1-0-2
    Ammo:
        Enable: true
        Ammo_Item_ID: 336
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: NOTE_PLING-1-2-0
        Sounds_Shoot_With_No_Ammo: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 30
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true 
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: false
        Reload_Duration: 60
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: false
        Bullet_Spread: 0.3
        Sneak_Before_Shooting: false
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Night_Vision: false
        Zoom_Amount: 5
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0.2
        Zoom_Before_Shooting: false
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 6
    Abilities:
        No_Vertical_Recoil: true
        Jetpack_Mode: true

replies.author: Thuang_dada
replies.txt_content: 不需要了已经....我把这枪换了
